long_description: With motion-loving 4-way stretch, the lightweight women's adidas Terrex Multi 3/4 Pants free you up to scramble, boulder, hike, scamper around the park with your dog and smile. Nylon/spandex fabric is quick drying and features a durable water repellent finish to shed precipitation. Elastic waist has a drawcord to fine-tune the fit. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. The women's adidas Terrex Multi 3/4 Pants have zippered hand pockets.
short_description: With motion-loving 4-way stretch, the lightweight women's adidas Terrex Multi 3/4 Pants free you up to scramble, boulder, hike, scamper around the park with your dog and smile.
